item.title: 得克萨斯州缩小天然气厂项目范围，争夺 54 亿美元资金
item.description: 德克萨斯州公用事业委员会（Public Utility Commission of Texas）周四表示，在一项旨在促进天然气发电厂发展的新计划中，该委员会选定了 17 个项目，寻求 53.8 亿美元的政府资助。【原文：The Public Utility Commission of Texas selected 17 projects, seeking $5.38 billion in government funding, to advance in a new program aimed at spurring the development of gas-fired power plants, the regulators said on Thursday.】

item.title: 竞选团队称，特朗普将废除拜登的清洁电力规定，加快电厂审批速度
item.description: 共和党总统竞选团队周四表示，唐纳德-特朗普将废除乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的多项清洁能源规定，同时加快发电厂的审批速度，以满足美国日益增长的电力需求。【原文：Donald Trump would rescind many of President Joe Biden's clean energy rules while also speeding approvals of power plants to meet the nation's rising electricity demands, the Republican's presidential campaign said on Thursday.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 下调年度预期，原因是美容产品需求放缓
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周四下调了年度销售额和利润预期，原因是其门店对高价化妆品和香水的需求放缓。【原文：Ulta Beauty cut its annual sales and profit forecasts on Thursday, hurt by slowing demand for higher-priced cosmetics and fragrances at its stores.】

item.title: Venture Global 寻求路易斯安那工厂首批液化天然气试运行货物的卸货许可
item.description: 美国液化天然气（LNG）公司Venture Global LNG周四寻求美国能源监管机构授权，在8月30日前在路易斯安那州在建的普拉克明出口工厂卸载第一批LNG试运行货物。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas (LNG) company Venture Global LNG sought authorization on Thursday from U.S. energy regulators by Aug. 30 to unload the first LNG commissioning cargo at the Plaquemines export plant under construction in Louisiana.】

item.title: 休闲服装制造商 Lululemon 因需求放缓下调年度预期
item.description: Lululemon Athletica 周四下调了年度销售额和利润预期，原因是北美市场竞争加剧，以及消费者对其价格昂贵的紧身裤和背心的消费有所选择。【原文：Lululemon Athletica cut its annual sales and profit forecasts on Thursday, hurt by increased competition and selective consumer spending in its pricey leggings and tank tops in North America.】

item.title: 人工智能服务器需求强劲，戴尔第二季度营收超预期
item.description: 戴尔科技公司周四公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是在个人电脑市场复苏的背景下，市场对其人工智能服务器的需求强劲。【原文：Dell Technologies beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, driven by strong demand for its AI-powered servers amid a recovering personal computer market.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的用户的社交媒体平台 X 出现故障
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 报道，社交媒体平台 X 周四下午遭遇停电。【原文：Social media platform X suffered outages on Thursday afternoon, according to outage tracking site Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称，纳斯达克期货公司将支付 2200 万美元以了结有关津贴计划的指控
item.description: 纳斯达克已同意支付 2200 万美元，以了结美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）对其前能源合约市场未披露向某些交易员提供津贴细节的指控。【原文：Nasdaq has agreed to pay $22 million to settle U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) charges that its former energy contract market failed to disclose details of perks offered to certain traders.】

item.title: 存储经纪人称，7 月份全球 IT 故障加剧了加州燃料存储问题
item.description: 储油经纪商 The Tank Tiger 本周告诉路透社，上个月的 CrowdStrike IT 故障导致数十架航班停飞，给加利福尼亚州的燃油市场带来了新的问题，迫使美国贸易商将运往该州的航空燃油储存在水运油轮上。【原文：Last month's CrowdStrike IT outage that grounded scores of flights created new problems for California's fuel market, forcing U.S. traders to store jet fuel destined for the state on waterborne tankers, storage broker The Tank Tiger told Reuters this week.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西法官在 X 争端中封禁了星链公司在该国的账户
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）周四下令冻结亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）的财务账户，原因是社交媒体平台 X 在巴西没有法定代表人。【原文：Brazilian Supreme Court judge Alexandre de Moraes on Thursday ordered the blocking of the financial accounts of billionaire Elon Musk's Starlink due to the lack of legal representatives in the country for social media platform X, a Supreme Court source told Reuters.】

item.title: 通用汽车必须面对有关故障变速器的大规模集体诉讼
item.description: 联邦上诉法院命令通用汽车公司面对一项集体诉讼，该诉讼声称通用汽车公司在知情的情况下销售了几十万辆变速箱有问题的轿车、卡车和越野车，违反了美国 26 个州的法律。【原文：General Motors was ordered by a federal appeals court to face a class action claiming it violated laws of 26 U.S. states by knowingly selling several hundred thousand cars, trucks and SUVs with faulty transmissions.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称戴尔试图再次出售网络安全公司 SecureWorks
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，个人电脑制造商戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies）正在再次探讨出售 SecureWorks 公司的可能性。【原文：Personal computer maker Dell Technologies is again exploring a possible sale of SecureWorks , after unsuccessful earlier attempts to find a buyer for the U.S. cybersecurity firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司首席财务官称，飞机交付延迟时间为 1 至 2 个月，比同行短
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）首席财务官周四表示，该公司交付飞机的平均延迟时间约为一到两个月，比大型同行面临的延迟时间要短。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's average delay to deliver aircraft is around one to two months, the firm's chief financial officer said on Thursday, highlighting it as shorter than the delays larger peers face.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司称在报告后优先考虑商业解决方案而非债务方案
item.description: 巴西 Azul 航空公司周四表示，彭博社最近的一篇报道称该公司正在权衡各种选择，以解决日益逼近的债务问题，这是对该报道的 "错误解读"，并补充说该公司优先考虑商业解决方案。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul stated on Thursday that a recent Bloomberg report saying the company was weighing options to address approaching debt obligations was "wrongly interpreted", adding the firm prioritizes commercial solutions.】

item.title: 解说：埃隆-马斯克与巴西最高法院法官的恩怨是怎么回事？
item.description: 巴西最高法院的一名法官命令亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在 24 小时内为其在巴西的信息平台 X 指定一名法律代表，否则将暂停该社交媒体网站在巴西的运营。【原文：A Brazilian Supreme Court justice has ordered billionaire Elon Musk to name a legal representative for his messaging platform X in Brazil within 24 hours or face suspension of the social media site in the country.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，苹果公司正在洽谈加入 OpenAI 的新一轮融资
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正在洽谈投资 OpenAI，作为新一轮融资的一部分，这将使这家 ChatGPT 制造商的估值超过 1000 亿美元。【原文：Apple is in talks to invest in OpenAI as part of a new fundraising round that would value the ChatGPT maker above $100 billion, Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 惠誉确认美国评级为 "AA+"，前景稳定
item.description: 评级机构惠誉周四确认美利坚合众国的信用等级为 "AA+"，称其具有人均收入高和财政灵活等结构性优势。【原文：Ratings agency Fitch affirmed the United States of America's credit rating at "AA+" on Thursday, citing its structural strengths including high per capita income and financial flexibility.】

item.title: 新日铁公司高管表示，同行敦促东京遏制从中国进口钢铁
item.description: 日本新日铁公司副董事长森隆弘（Takahiro Mori）在接受采访时说，新日铁公司和其他日本钢铁制造商正在敦促东京考虑抑制从世界最大的钢铁生产国中国进口廉价钢铁，以保护本地市场。【原文：Nippon Steel and other Japanese steelmakers are urging Tokyo to consider curbing cheap steel imports coming from China, the world's biggest steel producer, to protect the local market, Vice Chairman Takahiro Mori said in an interview.】

item.title: 通用汽车将把 BrightDrop 电动商用车转入旗下雪佛兰品牌
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周四表示，将把 BrightDrop 商用货车划归雪佛兰旗下，使这种纯电动汽车能够利用该品牌遍布北美的庞大经销商和服务网络。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday it would transition BrightDrop commercial vans under Chevrolet, allowing the all-electric vehicle to utilize the brand's extensive dealership and service network across North America.】

item.title: EIA 称今年劳动节前美国汽油价格走低
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）周四表示，进入周一劳动节联邦假日的周末，美国汽油价格大幅低于去年同期，从而结束了美国的夏季驾车季节。【原文：U.S. gasoline prices were substantially lower than last year heading into the weekend of the Labor Day federal holiday on Monday, which ends the U.S. summer driving season, the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: Polestar 首席财务官表示，电动汽车关税可能会损害欧洲企业和行业的利益
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar 的首席财务官周四表示，欧盟和美国对中国制造的电动汽车征收进口关税将损害欧洲企业的利益。【原文：Import tariffs imposed by the European Union and the United States on China-made electric vehicles will harm European based companies, the chief financial officer of Swedish EV maker Polestar said on Thursday.】

item.title: 洛克希德-雷神合资公司从美国陆军获得价值 13 亿美元的标枪导弹合同
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和 RTX 雷神公司（Raytheon）的合资企业获得了美国陆军价值 13 亿美元的 "标枪 "导弹后续合同。【原文：A joint venture between Lockheed Martin and RTX's Raytheon was awarded a $1.3 billion follow-on contract by the U.S. army for its Javelin missiles, which has played a major role in Ukraine's defense against Russia's invasion, Lockheed said on Thursday.】

item.title: Affirm 业绩飙升，BNPL 贷款公司力争提前实现盈利目标
item.description: Affirm 的股价周四上涨了 33%，此前这家 "先买后付 "贷款公司的季度业绩超出预期，并表示预计将在下一财年第四季度实现盈利，早于华尔街的预测。【原文：Affirm shares rose 33% on Thursday after the buy-now-pay-later lender trounced estimates for quarterly results and said it expects to be profitable by the fourth quarter of next fiscal year, sooner than Wall Street had forecast.】

item.title: 尽管夏季旅行人数创下新高，但美国航空取消率仍然很低
item.description: 美国运输部周四表示，尽管夏季旅行人数创下历史新高，而且网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 在 7 月份引发了严重的航班中断事件，但美国航空公司今年取消了 1.6% 的航班。【原文：U.S. airlines have canceled 1.6% of all flights this year despite record summer travel and significant disruptions in July sparked by cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike , the Transportation Department said Thursday.】

item.title: 力拓、比亚迪和 LG Energy 有资格参与智利 Altoandinos 锂项目
item.description: 国营矿业公司ENAMI周四表示，矿业巨头力拓和中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪是有资格提出在智利阿尔托安迪诺斯盐滩开发锂项目建议书的六家公司之一。【原文：Mining giant Rio Tinto and Chinese EV-maker BYD are among the six companies eligible to proceed with proposals to develop a lithium project in Chile's Altoandinos salt flats, state-run mining company ENAMI said on Thursday.】

item.title: Gap 第二季度销售额增长
item.description: 服装零售商 Gap 周四公布，受 Old Navy 和同名品牌需求强劲的帮助，其第二季度销售额猛增 5%。【原文：Apparel retailer Gap posted a 5% jump in its second-quarter sales on Thursday, helped by stronger demand at its Old Navy and namesake brands.】

item.title: 马拉松石油公司股东投票支持康菲石油公司 160 亿美元交易
item.description: 马拉松石油公司股东周四批准了康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）以近 160 亿美元收购这家美国石油生产商的交易。【原文：Marathon Oil shareholders on Thursday approved the U.S. oil producer's nearly $16 billion acquisition by ConocoPhillips , the company said.】

item.title: 美国 7 月未决房屋销售跌至历史最低点
item.description: 由于较高的房价和借贷成本将潜在买家挤出市场，7 月份美国旧房购买合同降至历史最低点。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes dropped to a record low in July as higher prices and borrowing costs drove potential buyers from the market.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，三星对诺基亚移动网络资产表现出兴趣
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，电信设备制造商诺基亚一直在探索其移动网络业务的各种选择，并引起了包括三星电子在内的收购者的兴趣。【原文：Telecom equipment maker Nokia has been exploring options for its mobile networks business and has drawn interest from suitors including Samsung Electronics , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 称其 Llama 人工智能模型正被银行和科技公司使用
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta 在周四的一份声明中说，Meta 的 Llama 人工智能模型正被高盛和 AT&T 等公司用于客户服务、文件审查和计算机代码生成等业务功能。【原文：Meta's Llama artificial intelligence models are being used by companies including Goldman Sachs and AT&T for business functions like customer service, document review and computer code generation, the social media giant said in a statement on Thursday.】
